text: The 1944 Colorado Buffaloes football team was an American football team that represented the University of Colorado during the 1944 college football season. Head coach Frank Potts led the team to a 2–0 mark in the MSC and 6–2 overall. The team's home field of Colorado Stadium was renamed Folsom Field in 1944, following the death of former head coach Fred Folsom. ==References== Colorado Category:Colorado Buffaloes football seasons Category:Mountain States Conference football champion seasons Colorado Buffaloes football
title: 1944 Colorado Buffaloes football team
